name: Phone For Baby and Kids
description:
Phone For Baby and Kids is Free and is a fun music “baby/kids phone” game for all babies!

This fun educational game will teach your kids and toddlers to learn numbers and songs for hours on end with classic nursery rhymes with adorable images.

We value children’s education and your child will love playing with this fun baby toy.

They will learn numbers letters and notes quickly and easily!

Your children will love learning with the songs and making sound effects!

Give it a try! You won't regret it!!! It's Totally Free App Game!!!
